New Records: Shubman Gill scored a record-breaking ton in the third T20I
Key Match Events: India registered the biggest win in T20Is after Gill's record-breaking ton
Hardik Pandya was named Player of the Series
Post-Match Reflections: Hardik Pandya downplayed his influence and credited the support staff for the team’s showing
Miscellaneous Highlights: Reports emerged that the curator was sacked from his role following the second T20 match between India and New Zealand
Others: This will be India’s last T20I for a while as the focus will shift completely to the other two formats
The surface offered a lot of turn to spinners, who bowled 30 of the 39.5 overs, and not a single six was hit in the second T20I
